<script>
    function toHash(str) {
        var hash = 5381, i = str.length;
        while (i) {
            hash = hash * 33 ^ str.charCodeAt(--i)
        }
        return hash >>> 0
    }
</script>
<script>
    (function (global) {
    //const cacheKey = global.cacheKey;
    const isOffline = 'onLine' in navigator && navigator.onLine === false;
    const hasServiceWorkerSupport = 'serviceWorker' in navigator;
    if (isOffline) {
        console.log('offline mode');
    }
    if (!hasServiceWorkerSupport) {
        console.log('service worker is not supported');
    }
    if (hasServiceWorkerSupport && !isOffline) {
        window.addEventListener('load', function () {
            const serviceWorkerPath = '/runtime-service-worker.js?v=3';
            navigator.serviceWorker
                .register(serviceWorkerPath, { scope: './' })
                .then(
                    function (registration) {
                        // Registration was successful
                        console.log(
                            'ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ',
                            registration.scope
                        );
                    },
                    function (err) {
                        // registration failed :(
                        console.log('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
                    }
                )
                .catch(function (err) {
                    console.log(err);
                });
        });

        // helper function to refresh the page
        var refreshPage = (function () {
            var refreshing;
            return function () {
                if (refreshing) return;
                // prevent multiple refreshes
                var refreshkey = 'refreshed' + location.href;
                var prevRefresh = localStorage.getItem(refreshkey);
                if (prevRefresh) {
                    localStorage.removeItem(refreshkey);
                    if (Date.now() - prevRefresh < 30000) {
                        return; // dont go into a refresh loop
                    }
                }
                refreshing = true;
                localStorage.setItem(refreshkey, Date.now());
                console.log('refereshing page');
                window.location.reload();
            };
        })();

        function messageServiceWorker(data) {
            return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {
                if (navigator.serviceWorker.controller) {
                    var worker = navigator.serviceWorker.controller;
                    var messageChannel = new MessageChannel();
                    messageChannel.port1.onmessage = replyHandler;
                    worker.postMessage(data, [messageChannel.port2]);
                    function replyHandler(event) {
                        resolve(event.data);
                    }
                } else {
                    resolve();
                }
            });
        }
    }
})(window);
</script>

<script id="d-js-load-css">
/**
 * There are a few <link> tags with CSS resource in them that are preloaded in the page
 * in each of those there is a "onload" handler which invokes the loadCSS callback
 * defined here.
 * We are monitoring 3 main CSS files - the runtime, the global and the page.
 * When each load we check to see if we can append them all in a batch. If threre
 * is no page css (which may happen on inner pages) then we do not wait for it
 */
(function () {
  let cssLinks = {};
  function loadCssLink(link) {
    link.onload = null;
    link.rel = "stylesheet";
    link.type = "text/css";
  }
  
    function checkCss() {
      const pageCssLink = document.querySelector("[id*='CssLink']");
      const widgetCssLink = document.querySelector("[id*='widgetCSS']");

        if (cssLinks && cssLinks.runtime && cssLinks.global && (!pageCssLink || cssLinks.page) && (!widgetCssLink || cssLinks.widget)) {
            const storedRuntimeCssLink = cssLinks.runtime;
            const storedPageCssLink = cssLinks.page;
            const storedGlobalCssLink = cssLinks.global;
            const storedWidgetCssLink = cssLinks.widget;

            storedGlobalCssLink.disabled = true;
            loadCssLink(storedGlobalCssLink);

            if (storedPageCssLink) {
                storedPageCssLink.disabled = true;
                loadCssLink(storedPageCssLink);
            }

            if(storedWidgetCssLink) {
                storedWidgetCssLink.disabled = true;
                loadCssLink(storedWidgetCssLink);
            }

            storedRuntimeCssLink.disabled = true;
            loadCssLink(storedRuntimeCssLink);

            requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    storedRuntimeCssLink.disabled = false;
                    storedGlobalCssLink.disabled = false;
                    if (storedPageCssLink) {
                      storedPageCssLink.disabled = false;
                    }
                    if (storedWidgetCssLink) {
                      storedWidgetCssLink.disabled = false;
                    }
                    // (SUP-4179) Clear the accumulated cssLinks only when we're
                    // sure that the document has finished loading and the document 
                    // has been parsed.
                    if(document.readyState === 'interactive') {
                      cssLinks = null;
                    }
                }, 0);
            });
        }
    }
  

  function loadCSS(link) {
    try {
      var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      var noCSS = !!urlParams.get("nocss");
      var cssTimeout = urlParams.get("cssTimeout") || 0;

      if (noCSS) {
        return;
      }
      if (link.href.includes("d-css-runtime")) {
        cssLinks.runtime = link;
        checkCss();
      } else if (link.id === "siteGlobalCss") {
        cssLinks.global = link;
        checkCss();
      } 
      
      else if (link.id.includes("CssLink")) {
        cssLinks.page = link;
        checkCss();
      } else if (link.id.includes("widgetCSS")) {
        cssLinks.widget = link;
        checkCss();
      }
      
      else {
        requestIdleCallback(function () {
          window.setTimeout(function () {
            loadCssLink(link);
          }, parseInt(cssTimeout, 10));
        });
      }
    } catch (e) {
      throw e
    }
  }
  window.loadCSS = window.loadCSS || loadCSS;
})();
</script>



<script data-role="deferred-init" type="text/javascript">
    /* usage: window.getDeferred(<deferred name>).resolve() or window.getDeferred(<deferred name>).promise.then(...)*/
    function Def(){this.promise=new Promise((function(a,b){this.resolve=a,this.reject=b}).bind(this))}
    const defs={};
    window.getDeferred=function(a){return null==defs[a]&&(defs[a]=new Def),defs[a]}
    window.waitForDeferred = function (b, a, c) {
      let d = window?.getDeferred?.(b);
      d
        ? d.promise.then(a)
        : c && ["complete", "interactive"].includes(document.readyState)
        ? setTimeout(a, 1)
        : c
        ? document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", a)
        : console.error(`Deferred  does not exist`);
    };
</script>

</div>

 <div class="u_1895992238 dmRespRow dmDefaultListContentRow" style="text-align:center" id="1895992238"> <div class="dmRespColsWrapper" id="1985928959"> <div class="large-12 medium-12 small-12 dmRespCol" id="1407246553"> <div class="dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1564288601" style="transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out 0s;"> <h2 class="m-size-30 text-align-center"><span class="m-font-size-30" m-font-size-set="true" style="display: initial;">ADMISSION AND ENROLMENT</span></h2> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="dmRespRow u_1930596103" id="1930596103"> <div class="dmRespColsWrapper" id="1188511559"> <div class="dmRespCol small-12 medium-12 large-12" id="1960996885"> <div class="u_1180079130 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1180079130" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>1. What are the types of programmes available at Kidz Meadow?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">We offer half day (7am to 1pm/1.30pm) and full day programmes (7am to 7pm/7.30pm).&nbsp;</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>2. Do all Kidz Meadow Childcare Centres offer Infant Care services?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Infant care is available at selected centres - Bedok North, Buangkok Crescent (979C &amp; 986C), Hougang, Punggol and Yishun.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>3. Can I enrol my unborn child for infant Care?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">You can submit a registration for Infant Care for your child who is not born yet. Your childs birth certificate can be given at a later date.</p><p class="rteBlock">It is advisable to send your child for half day for the first 3 days and subsequently, the usual full day.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>4. Are there any subsidies available on school fees?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Basic Subsidy</strong></p><p class="rteBlock">All parents with Singapore Citizen children enrolled in childcare centres licensed by ECDA will be eligible for a Basic Subsidy. The subsidy helps to keep child care fees affordable for parents. It is extended to both working and non-working mothers and varies for infant and childcare programmes.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Programme:&nbsp;</strong>Infant</p><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Working Mother:</strong> $600</p><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Non-Working Mother:</strong>&nbsp;$300</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Programme:</strong> 
 Childcare</p><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Working Mother:</strong> $300</p><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Non-Working Mother:</strong> $150</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong>Additional Subsidy</strong></p><p class="rteBlock">Families with monthly household incomes of $12,000 and below are eligible for Additional Subsidy, with lower income families receiving higher subsidies. Larger families with 5 or more family members with at least 3 dependants who are not earning an income can also choose to have their Additional Subsidy computed on a per capita income (PCI) basis.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Attendance of at least one day per month is needed to be eligible for Basic Subsidy and Additional Subsidy.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Visit the Early Childhood Development Agency (ECDA) website at <a type="url" href="http://www.ecda.gov.sg/Pages/Subsidies-and-Financial-Assistance.aspx" target="_blank" data-runtime-url="http://www.ecda.gov.sg/Pages/Subsidies-and-Financial-Assistance.aspx">www.ecda.gov.sg/Pages/Subsidies-and-Financial-Assistance.aspx</a> 
for more information on the childcare subsidy scheme.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>5. What is Baby bonus and can it be used at your centres?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">You may use the Baby Bonus cash gift and the funds in the Child Development Account (CDA) where the government matches dollar-for-dollar contributions to defray childcare expenses.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">CDA payments can be made for the monthly school fees at all our centres. It can also be used for other miscellaneous fees such as deposit, mattress, uniform and school transport.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">However, CDA cannot be used for payment of enrichment programmes at all Kidz Meadow Centres. For more details on CDA account, please visit <a type="url" href="http://www.babybonus.msf.gov.sg/parent/index.html" target="_blank" data-runtime-url="http://www.babybonus.msf.gov.sg/parent/index.html">http://www.babybonus.msf.gov.sg/parent/index.html</a>.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>6. Do you accept students who are Singapore PRs or Foreigners?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">We accept students who are Singapore PRs or Foreigners. As these students are not eligible for basic subsidy, their fees differ from Singaporean students. Please contact the centre directly for more information.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>7. My child is a foreigner with a long-term visit pass. Will Kidz Meadow assist to apply for a Student Pass?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">The centre will submit the childs details on <a type="url" href="https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/cpindex" target="_blank" data-runtime-url="https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/cpindex">https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/cpindex</a> 
Parents will be given the printed acknowledgement that has the student application number.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Parents will then have to log in to <a type="url" href="https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/index" target="_blank" data-runtime-url="https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/index">https://eservices.ica.gov.sg/ipsolarplus/web/index</a> 
using the same student application number to complete the second part of the application. During which, parents must ensure compulsory vaccinations have been done for their child (e.g. MMR) and that they have ICAs approval to bring the child in during COVID-19 period.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Occasionally, the centre and parents have to check the same website for the application status. If approved, there will be an approval letter and the centre may then enrol the child.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">For more information on Student Pass Application, visit <a value="https://www.ica.gov.sg/reside/STP/apply/msf" label="" type="url" href="https://www.ica.gov.sg/reside/STP/apply/msf" target="_blank" data-runtime-url="https://www.ica.gov.sg/reside/STP/apply/msf">https://www.ica.gov.sg/reside/STP/apply/msf</a></p><br><p class="rteBlock">Note: &nbsp;Students with Dependent Pass do not need to apply for Student Pass.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>8. Are there school transport services available?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">School transport services are available at selected centres. You may check with the centre of your choice on the availability of school bus services to and from your home and the centre.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>9. Does your centre accept children with special needs?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Special applications such as this will be reviewed and decided on a case-to-case basis. Certain disabilities require special attention and facilities for the child. Depending on the special needs of the child, we will assess if our centre is suitable and appropriate for the best interest of the child.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1952530894 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1952530894"> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">CURRICULUM&nbsp;</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1384174033 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1384174033" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>10. What is unique about Kidz Meadows curriculum?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">At Kidz Meadow, we empower childrens learning through our fun, creative and unique nature inspired programme. Nature Magnified, our niche programme, gives opportunities for the children to interact with diverse natural elements. For infants to Nursery 1 children will also be guided to explore nature using their sense of sight, hearing, touch and smell in I CAN SPY! Nature activities.</p><p class="rteBlock">Being close to nature builds their natural curiosity towards learning and provides benefits to childrens overall well-being.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">For more information, visit our <a value="programmes-and-curriculum" label="" type="page" href="/programmes-and-curriculum" data-runtime-url="/programmes-and-curriculum">curriculum</a> 
page&nbsp;</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>11. How is Kidz Meadow different from other childcare centres?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">We provide high-quality education at affordable fees, with a comprehensive curriculum that focuses on integrated learning activities.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Character development through our nature-exploratory approach and culturally rich programmes, are also infused in our daily lessons where we aim to instil positive life values in the children.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">To enhance our childrens holistic development, we collaborate and partner with a variety of community and charitable organisations. Every year, our children enjoy opportunities to participate in community initiatives with government agencies such as the National Parks Board, Public Utilities Board (PUB) and the Start Small, Dream Big project as part of the Presidents Challenge.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1688682254 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1688682254" data-styletopreserve="{" background-image":""}"=""> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">QUALITY STANDARDS</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1786938397 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1786938397" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>12. Kidz Meadow Childcare &amp; Development Centres registered under any government bodies?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Kidz Meadow Childcare &amp; Development Centres are licensed and regulated under Early Childhood Development Agency (ECDA). ECDA serves as the regulatory and developmental authority for the early childhood sector in Singapore, overseeing key aspects of childrens development below the age of seven.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>13. What are Kidz Meadow Childcare &amp; Development Centres awards and accreditations?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Kidz Meadow is committed to offering quality education to our preschoolers. The following are the list of awards:&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong><span style="text-decoration:underline">Partner Operator (POP)</span></strong></p><p class="rteBlock">Our centres have been successfully appointed as an ECDA Childcare Partner Operator. The POP Scheme seeks to improve the quality and affordability of childcare services for parents by:&nbsp;</p><p class="rteBlock">a) Supporting childcare operators to keep fees affordable,</p><p class="rteBlock">b) Raising the quality of the centres programmes and</p><p class="rteBlock">c) Improving the professional development and career progression of teachers.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Our POP centres are located at Buangkok Crescent (979C &amp; 986C), Hougang, Jurong West, Woodlands and Yishun.</p><p class="rteBlock">&nbsp;</p><p class="rteBlock"><strong><span style="text-decoration:underline">Singapore Preschool Accreditation Framework (SPARK)</span></strong></p><p class="rteBlock">Our centres have also attained the ECDAs Singapore Preschool Accreditation Framework (SPARK) award, SPARK is a quality assurance framework to assist preschools in Singapore in raising their quality. It looks into all aspects of a quality programme which includes the Curriculum, Environment, Teachers, Resources, Partnership with Parents and Community, and Pedagogy.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">These centres have successfully attained SPARK accreditation: Buangkok (979C &amp; 986C), Eunos, Hougang, Jurong West, Woodlands and Yishun.</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong><span style="text-decoration:underline">Healthy Preschool&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p class="rteBlock">Our Centres are certified as a Healthy Preschool by the Health Promotion Board (HPB). Kidz Meadow participates in the Healthy Meals in Pre-schools Programme (HMPP) which empowers preschools to provide healthier meals and encourages them to educate children on eating right. The meals served to the children are nutritious and halal.</p><br><p class="rteBlock"><strong><span style="text-decoration:underline">SG Clean Award&nbsp;</span></strong></p><p class="rteBlock">Our Centres have been awarded the SG Clean quality mark by the National Environment Agency (NEA) under its SG Clean campaign. It reflects Kidz Meadows commitment to maintain high standards of environmental public hygiene at the centres.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1612018321 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1612018321" data-styletopreserve="{" background-image":""}"=""> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">FOOD SERVED</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1279686235 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1279686235" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>14. Is the food cooked by an in-house cook or catered?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">The food at all out centres is cooked by an in-house cook.&nbsp;</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>15. Is there a variety of food provided?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">The menu provided is different daily and rotated every two weeks.&nbsp;</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>16. Is the food prepared halal-certified?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Only halal-certified ingredients are used to prepare meals.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>17. Will special arrangements be made if my child has allergies or special dietary arrangements?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Yes, the food will be specially prepared accordingly. Parents must inform the teachers about your childs allergies.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1962965096 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1962965096" data-styletopreserve="{" background-image":""}"=""> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">HYGIENE &amp; HEALTH CHECKS</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1640657657 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1640657657" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>18. What are the precautionary measures taken to ensure the centres are clean and safe for our children?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Kidz Meadow adheres to the safe management measures set by Early Childhood Development Agency (ECDA), in consultation with the Ministry of Health (MOH).</p><br><p class="rteBlock">A comprehensive cleaning procedure has been put in place to ensure that teaching materials, toys, mattresses and all areas such as diaper area and toilets, are cleaned and sanitised daily and weekly.</p><br><p class="rteBlock">In the event of mandatory or voluntary closure, we will conduct a thorough cleaning and disinfecting of our premises, equipment, materials and toys during the closure period.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>19. How often are health checks conducted on the children daily?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Health checks are conducted three times daily  in the morning upon arrival, after lunch and after naptime. This includes taking their temperature, checking their hands and feet for spots and asking them verbally if they are experiencing flu-like symptoms.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>20. What does the centre do when there are children with runny nose, cough and other infectious diseases?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">During health checks in the morning, children with symptoms such as fever, cough, flu, ulcers and rashes will be sent home immediately. He will be isolated at the sick bay until he is fetched.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">We urge parents to keep their children at home if they are unwell and to consult a doctor. Bringing your child to the centre when he is unwell is strongly not recommended.</p><p class="rteBlock">All staff at our centres follow strict guidelines for children's sickness to prevent viruses from spreading.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1485119794 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1485119794" data-styletopreserve="{" background-image":""}"=""> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">COMMUNICATION AND UPDATES ON CHILD</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1569154100 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1569154100" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>21. How do I communicate with my childs teacher?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">You may communicate with your child's teacher via a mobile app, MERCU Taidii. &nbsp;Parents can access the following through this app:</p><br> <ul class="rteBlock defaultList"><li>Receive messages from the school and send messages to the teachers&nbsp;</li><li>View photos of your childs pick up and drop off from school</li><li>View photos of class activities and centre events and celebrations</li><li>Announcements by the Principal and HQ</li><li>Access your childs e-portfolio</li><li>Access the Termly Newsletter&nbsp;</li></ul> 
<br><p class="rteBlock">Parents can also communicate with teachers during pick up and drop off time but are encouraged to make appointments to see the teachers for longer discussions.&nbsp;</p><br></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>22. How do I get updated on my childs progress at school?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">You will be updated on your childs individual progress via &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</p> <ul class="rteBlock defaultList"><li>Childs individual e-portfolio</li><li>Parent-Teacher Meetings held twice a year</li><li>Tea sessions held beginning of the year for new children&nbsp;</li><li>Ad hoc meetings scheduled with the teachers&nbsp;</li></ul> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1903074697 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1903074697" data-styletopreserve="{" background-image":""}"=""> <h2 class="text-align-center"><span style="display: unset;">TRANSITION PERIOD</span></h2> 
</div> 
 <div class="u_1141844557 widget-832a29 dmCustomWidget" data-lazy-load="" data-title="" id="1141844557" dmle_extension="custom_extension" data-element-type="custom_extension" icon="false" surround="false" data-widget-id="832a29738c2b44fdb4e63369b1bf458a" data-widget-version="78" data-widget-config="" data-widget-initialized=""> <ul class="accordion-wrapper plusMinus  " data-first-expanded="false"> <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>23. This would be my childs first time at a school. Should I accompany the child to the centre?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">We encourage parents to accompany your child to school, depending on your childs age and how soon he settles down. Once your child begins to interact with other children, leave and allow him to settle down on his own. Your continued presence may make the adjustment more difficult as your child would take a longer time to overcome his separation anxiety.&nbsp;</p><br><p class="rteBlock">Please contact the centres directly as this arrangement varies for each centre and is subjected to the prevailing measures set by Early Childhood Development Agency (ECDA) during the current COVID-19 pandemic and other diseases outbreak.</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
 <li class="accordion-item"> <div class="accordion-title"> <div class="title-text"> <h3>24. What should I do if my child refuses to attend the centre, or has fears and nightmares about going there?</h3> 
</div> 
 <div class="arrow-wrapper"> <div class="arrow"> <div class="horizontal"></div> 
 <div class="vertical"></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
 <div class="accordion-description"> <div class="section"> <div class="section-inner"><p class="rteBlock">Be calm and direct with your child. Emphasise all the fun he will have. Reassure your child that he will soon settle down in the new environment and make new friends. Meet up with your childs teacher to discuss ways to help your child overcome his fears. By meeting up with the teacher and speaking positively about the school and teacher to your child, he will gain confidence and feel that the teacher is someone he can trust. Allow your child a period of 2 weeks to 1 month to adjust to the new routine.</p><p class="rteBlock">&nbsp;</p><p class="rteBlock">During this adjustment period, it is important for parents and teachers to communicate regularly. Parents can tap on the mobile app to communicate with the teachers.&nbsp;</p></div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</li> 
</ul> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div> 
</div>

 <div class="u_1367569236 dmRespRow fullBleedChanged fullBleedMode" id="1367569236"> <div class="dmRespColsWrapper" id="1689393156"> <div class="dmRespCol empty-column large-12 medium-12 small-12 u_1275787312" id="1275787312"></div>

 <div class="dmRespRow u_1611992228" id="1611992228"> <div class="dmRespColsWrapper" id="1829762082"> <div class="u_1680159815 dmRespCol small-12 large-3 medium-3" id="1680159815"> <div class="u_1790143398 dmNewParagraph" data-element-type="paragraph" data-version="5" id="1790143398" style="transition: none 0s ease 0s; text-align: left; display: block;"> <h5 style="line-height: initial;" class="text-align-center"><span style="display: initial; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">HEADQUARTERS</span></h5>

<!-- Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp. -->
<div class="pswp" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-hidden="true">

    <!-- Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba(). -->
    <div class="pswp__bg"></div>

    <!-- Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden. -->
    <div class="pswp__scroll-wrap">

        <!-- Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on. -->
        <div class="pswp__container">
            <div class="pswp__item"></div>
            <div class="pswp__item"></div>
            <div class="pswp__item"></div>
        </div>

        <!-- Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed. -->
        <div class="pswp__ui pswp__ui--hidden">

            <div class="pswp__top-bar">

                <!--  Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed. -->

                <div class="pswp__counter"></div>

                <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--close" title="Close (Esc)"></button>

                <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--share" title="Share"></button>

                <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--fs" title="Toggle fullscreen"></button>

                <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--zoom" title="Zoom in/out"></button>

                <!-- Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR -->
                <!-- element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running -->
                <div class="pswp__preloader">
                    <div class="pswp__preloader__icn">
                      <div class="pswp__preloader__cut">
                        <div class="pswp__preloader__donut"></div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="pswp__share-modal pswp__share-modal--hidden pswp__single-tap">
                <div class="pswp__share-tooltip"></div> 
            </div>

            <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--arrow--left" title="Previous (arrow left)">
            </button>

            <button class="pswp__button pswp__button--arrow--right" title="Next (arrow right)">
            </button>

            <div class="pswp__caption">
                <div class="pswp__caption__center"></div>
            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

</div>
